desc: Experience healthy protein how it was meant to be from award-winning Master Salumiere, Greg Laketek. Discover nitrate-free, no-added sugar salami: Soppressata, Spanish Chorizo, Barolo, Finocchiona, and Tartufo. Additional speciality meats available including Coppa and Wagyu Bresaola

layout.text:
No Added Sugar
No Nitrate or Nitrites
No Hormones or Antibiotics
Truly All-Natural
